name: Phi Wipes After Care 51
description: Not at home? On the go? Afraid of washing your new brows? No problem! No more washing the eyebrows with warm water and neutral soap after treatment. Our newest formulation contains the most important ingredients to clean your brows before applying SkinCandy aftercare to the brows  Usage: Gently clean your brows with wipes instead of water according to the aftercare instructions given. Repeat the procedure suitable for your skin type and apply thin layer of SkinCandy.
